verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Nitakuimbia Mungu wangu, kweli.
Asubuhi mchana usiku,
Nitakuimbia Mungu wangu kwa shangwe,
vinanda ngoma nitavipiga,
vigelegele shangwe na makofi,
nitakusifu milele yote.
